triples.name: Perceiver
triples.relevance: Otter builds upon Flamingo with Perceiver architecture as its foundation for processing multi-modal inputs.

triples.name: Fine-tuning (deep learning)
triples.relevance: Instruction tuning is a form of fine-tuning applied to the model for improving instruction following capabilities.

triples.name: In-context learning (natural language processing)
triples.relevance: Otter is specifically designed to leverage both textual and visual in-context examples to enhance instruction following.

triples.name: Multimodal learning
triples.relevance: Otter is a multi-modal model that processes text, images, and video as integrated modalities.

triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: Otter extends large multimodal models with instruction tuning capabilities for general-purpose assistance.

triples.name: Computer vision
triples.relevance: Otter handles visual understanding tasks including image and video processing as core capabilities.

triples.name: Transformer (deep learning)
triples.relevance: The transformer architecture underpins the Perceiver architecture used in Otter for processing multi-modal data.

triples.name: Attention (machine learning)
triples.relevance: Attention mechanisms are fundamental to both the Perceiver architecture and the transformer-based design of Otter.
